attributes.action: Allow BTEC students to receive centre assessed grades.
attributes.additional_details:
Throughout the year we have been put at a disadvantage where lessons have had to be altered , school lockdown due to outbreaks, national lockdown which has prevented students to meet with teachers face to face. 
Despite the online learning and voice interactions learning from home has proven to be difficult for many students. Many areas within England have been placed in tier 4 having limited/ no access to libraries or study places which has prevented students to achieve the best of their ability.
attributes.background: BTEC Students should have the opportunity to receive centre assessed grades. Due to the last notice of Alevel and GCSE not going ahead as planned BTEC students should also be considered and put into this category.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
